changeInput

public static java.lang.String changeInput(java.lang.String spkInput,
                                           java.lang.String report,
                                           long jobId,
                                           boolean isLibrary)
Change input for a likelihood evaluation job.

Parameters:
spkInput - SPK input file as a String object.
report - SPK report file as a String object.
jobId - job ID.
isLibrary - true if the job belongs to the library, false otherwise.
Returns:
a String object containing the modified SPK input file.

convertToPopulationAnalysis

protected static java.lang.String convertToPopulationAnalysis(java.lang.String source)
Convert an individual model to a population model if it is a two-stage analysis.

Parameters:
source - a source XML representation of an individual model.
Returns:
the modified source XML representation of a population model.

replaceSourceParameters

protected static java.lang.String replaceSourceParameters(java.lang.String source,
                                                          java.lang.String report)
Replace initial values of parameters in the souce by those in the report.

Parameters:
source - a source XML representation of an population model.
report - the report XML of the same job with the source.
Returns:
the modified source XML representation of a population model.

findNEta

protected static int findNEta(java.lang.String source)
Find number of random effects.

Parameters:
source - the source XML without element.
Returns:
number of random effects

insertLeElement

public static java.lang.String insertLeElement(java.lang.String source,
                                               java.lang.String jobMethodCode)
Insert element for using likelihood evaluation methods.

Parameters:
source - the source XML without element.
jobMethodCode - the job method code.
Returns:
the source XML with element inserted.
